data.text: a dead body: corpse; especially: the dressed body of a meat animal
examples: Butchers trimmed the meat from the carcass.
It was nearly noon when he finally hauled his carcass out of bed.
the carcass of an abandoned automobile

data.text: the living, material, or physical body
examples: Butchers trimmed the meat from the carcass.
It was nearly noon when he finally hauled his carcass out of bed.
the carcass of an abandoned automobile

data.text: the decaying or worthless remains of a structure
examples: Butchers trimmed the meat from the carcass.
It was nearly noon when he finally hauled his carcass out of bed.
the carcass of an abandoned automobile
